wikipedia_page.main: Andy Dornan (born 19 August 1961) is a Scottish former football player.

response: By March 1988, the club was planning to build a new stadium at nearby Bescot Crescent. Within two years, construction work was underway at the new stadium site and the last league game at Fellows Park was played on 1 May 1990, when Walsall, in the process of their second successive relegation which took them into the Football League Fourth Division, drew 1–1 at home to Rotherham United, with Andy Dornan scoring the last league goal at the ground – his only goal in his time at Walsall.

link_mentions.page: 1988 Football League Third Division play-off Final
